name: Time Obsession
description:
Time Obsession is a puzzle game centered around the ability of stop and reverse time. There are 15 levels with rising difficulties.  First 5 levels focus on usage of grenade launcher. The next 5 on time stopping. And the last 5 on rewinding mechanic.

Estimated play time is around 40 minutes to an hour and a half.

If you want a challenging experience, we recommend not to choose to reveal the hint or the answer... or at least try them first. 

REMEMBER, if you don't know where to go next, follow the light.

If you have any comments please feel free to leave it down below.  😎 

The browser version can feel a bit laggy, but it will get better over time. We recommend that you download the game and play it on your PC for a better experience. 😀

The game can take about 2 minutes to load.

==================== Credits ====================

Mifuu : Game Design, Code, Art

Zarcarus : Music Composition, Testing, Advisor

Testers : Bas, Bhum, Ford, Non

Additional sound effects from https://zapslat.com

===================Known Bug==================

Mouse Pad can not be used as intended.
